src.core.agent_service module

class src.core.agent_service.AgentService[source]

Bases: object

Core service for the Vidwaan Agent. Orchestrates the RAG pipeline: Query -> Vector DB -> Graph DB -> LLM -> Answer.

process_query(question: str, session_id: str | None = None) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Main RAG pipeline entry point.
